dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: DeepSeek sinks stocks, Big Tech earnings, and AI for cancer: AI news roundup
News Content: Graphic: Images: Justin Sullivan, David Paul Morris/Bloomberg, Chesnot, Justin Sullivan / Staff

Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek sparked a global tech stock sell-off earlier this week that saw chip leader Nvidia lose almost $600 billion in market value — a record-setting loss for a U.S. company.

Meanwhile, investors awaited earnings results from Meta, Microsoft, and Apple.

Read about this and more in this week’s AI news roundup.

Microsoft stock falls almost 5% after modest Azure growthMicrosoft CEO Satya Nadella at OpenAI DevDay on November 6, 2023 in San Francisco, California. - Photo: Justin Sullivan (Getty Images)

Microsoft (MSFT) shares fell by around 5% during after-hours trading on Wednesday after it reported Azure cloud computing growth toward the bottom range of expectations.

Read More

Meta stock climbs after earnings beat on AI, smart glassesMeta CEO Mark Zuckerberg wearing Orion AR glasses during Meta Connect in Menlo Park, California on September 25, 2024. - Photo: David Paul Morris/Bloomberg (Getty Images)

Meta (META) stock climbed by around 4% in after-hours trading after chief executive Mark Zuckerberg said on the company’s earnings call that it plans to invest “hundreds of billions of dollars” in artificial intelligence infrastructure in the long term.

Read More

Alibaba says it has an AI model even better than DeepSeekAlibaba Group at Viva Technology on June 14, 2023 in Paris, France. - Photo: Chesnot (Getty Images)

Days after Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek sparked a global tech stock sell-off, a homegrown rival said its new AI model performed even better.

Read More

Microsoft thinks China’s DeepSeek might have used OpenAI’s tech before its big breakthroughIn this photo illustration, the DeepSeek app is displayed on an iPhone screen on January 27, 2025 in San Anselmo, California. - Image: Justin Sullivan / Staff (Getty Images)

Microsoft (MSFT) and OpenAI are investigating whether a group connected to the Chinese AI startup DeepSeek accessed OpenAI’s data without permission, according to a new report.

Read More

Big Tech has a big DeepSeek problemDeepSeek logo displayed on a smartphone. - Illustration: Omer Taha Cetin/Anadolu (Getty Images)

Big Tech’s multi-billion dollar spending on artificial intelligence will be under investor scrutiny this week — even more so after China’s DeepSeek sent shockwaves through Wall Street and Silicon Valley with a cheap yet competitive AI model.

Read More

The White House is looking into DeepSeek over national security concernsThe DeepSeek app is displayed on an iPhone screen on January 27, 2025 in San Anselmo, California. - Illustration: Justin Sullivan (Getty Images)

The White House is looking into national security concerns over the Chinese artificial intelligence app DeepSeek after its developer prompted a global tech sell-off.

Read More

DeepSeek is the ‘Temu of AI,’ analysts sayPhoto: Greg Baker/AFP (Getty Images)

After traders sold off global technology stocks en masse Monday on news of a Chinese artificial intelligence competitor, some aren’t too concerned with DeepSeek’s seemingly meteoric rise.

Read More

Trump says DeepSeek’s AI bombshell should be a ‘wake-up call’ for Big TechDonald Trump addresses the 2025 Republican Issues Conference at the Trump National Doral Miami on January 27, 2025 in Doral, Florida. - Photo: Joe Raedle (Getty Images)

The release of DeepSeek-R1, a new open-source reasoning model from a Chinese artificial intelligence startup, should be a “wake-up call” for the U.S. tech industry, President Donald Trump said.

Read More

LinkedIn co-founder Reid Hoffman just raised $25 million to take on cancer with AIReid Hoffman, partner at Greylock Partners, during the Bloomberg Technology Summit in San Francisco, California, US, on Thursday, May 9, 2024. - Image: Bloomberg / Contributor (Getty Images)

LinkedIn (MSFT) co-founder and venture capitalist Reid Hoffman on Monday launched an AI startup aimed at discovering new treatments for cancer.

Story Continues

Read More

Big Retail is bringing out Big AI. Consumers might not even noticeNRF ‘25 Retail’s Big Show in New York on Jan. 14, 2025. - Photo: Francisco Velasquez/Quartz

AI is no longer just a buzzword in retail. It’s a tool retailers are increasingly deploying to transform their business operations.

Read More

Apple earnings are coming. Here’s what to expectApple CEO Tim Cook at the Apple Worldwide Developers Conference on June 5, 2023 in Cupertino, California. - Photo: Justin Sullivan (Getty Images)

Apple (AAPL) is expected to release its fiscal first quarter results after the market closes on Thursday.

Read More

Nvidia is doing damage control after DeepSeek’s AI advance routed the stockNvidia headquarters on February 23, 2024 in Santa Clara, California. - Photo: Andrej Sokolow/picture alliance (Getty Images)

Nvidia (NVDA) addressed its tumbling stock on Monday by saying Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek will need more of its chips for new models.

Read More

DeepSeek is limiting sign-ups after a ‘large-scale’ cyberattackDeepSeek, a Chinese artificial intelligence startup, is raising questions over the U.S.’s dominance in the field. - Image: Andrey Rudakov/Bloomberg (Getty Images)

Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek said it would temporarily limit signups after being the victim of “large-scale malicious attacks” on its servers.

Read More

Chinese AI startup DeepSeek is rattling markets. Here’s what to knowPhoto illustration of DeepSeek’s logo on a smartphone screen. - Illustration: Omer Taha Cetin/Anadolu (Getty Images)

A Chinese artificial intelligence startup is rattling Silicon Valley and Wall Street after it demonstrated AI models on par with OpenAI’s — for a fraction of the cost and energy.

Read More

For the latest news, Facebook, Twitter and Instagram.

View Comments

Next I will provide you some predictions of stock price movement probabilities and the corresponding analysis by others in the previous rounds.
Note that others' predictions may indicate that they have some other information about the stock price. A high prediction may indicate that they have some positive information about the stock, while a low prediction may indicate that they have some megative information about the stock.
Also note that there are multiple rounds of precitions, demonstrating the trend of others' beliefs.
Please take these information into consideration when prediction the stock price movement probabilities.
Previous predictions:
Round: 0
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.65, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.35, Reasoning: The news indicates a mixed outlook for Apple, with positive earnings guidance boosting investor sentiment, while external factors like Trump's tariff threats create uncertainty. The strong earnings outlook suggests a likelihood of stock price increase, but ongoing tariff concerns could dampen enthusiasm. Given the recent trends in stock futures and Apple's response to recent market turmoil, I estimate a higher probability of stock price rise than fall.
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.35, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.65, Reasoning: The news headline indicates mixed signals for Apple (AAPL). On one hand, it mentions a "Dow Jones Dive" due to Trump's tariff order, which is generally negative for market sentiment and Apple, given its global supply chain. It also notes Apple broke a "key level," which, without further context, is likely a negative indicator in technical analysis, suggesting a potential downtrend. A rising personal consumption and expenditures index usually translates into investors being bearish. However, the headline also notes MicroStrategy making a move along with NVIDIA. The article doesn't explicitly claim Apple also making moves. Considering the tariff order and potential technical breakdown, a negative outlook is slightly more probable. MicroStrategy making moves alongside Nvidia might not be directly tied to Apple's potential. The rising inflation rate also contributes to bearish sentiment.
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.3, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.4, Reasoning: The news piece presents a mixed outlook for Apple. While the analyst highlights Apple's less vulnerable position compared to other Big Tech companies regarding AI-related capital expenditure (due to its hybrid CapEx model),  he maintains a Hold rating on the stock. This is primarily because of concerns over the iPhone upgrade cycle, which is seen as being negatively impacted by mismatched hardware and software rollouts. The analyst's concern outweighs the positive aspect of Apple's strategic advantage in AI spending.  The lack of a predicted 'super-cycle' or significant upgrade cycle fueled by AI further dampens the positive outlook. Therefore, the probability of a price rise is lower than the probability of it staying the same or falling slightly.
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.85, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.15, Reasoning: The news highlights that Apple Inc. (AAPL) has posted better-than-expected earnings and provided guidance for solid growth. Positive earnings surprises and strong growth guidance are typically bullish signals for a stock, as they indicate the company is performing well and has a positive outlook. This is likely to instill confidence in investors and could lead to increased buying activity. Given this context, the probability of the stock price rising is high, while the probability of it falling is low.
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.55, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.45, Reasoning: The news discusses the impact of Chinese AI startup DeepSeek on global tech stocks, including Apple's competitors like Microsoft and Nvidia. While Apple's earnings report is upcoming, the news does not directly mention Apple's AI capabilities or financial performance. However, the overall tech stock sell-off led by DeepSeek's emergence could potentially affect Apple's stock. Given that the news does not provide specific information that would negatively impact Apple directly, and considering that Apple's earnings report is expected soon, which could potentially be positive, the probabilities are slightly skewed towards a positive or neutral outcome for Apple's stock price in the short term.
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.8, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.2, Reasoning: The news headline states that Apple's Fiscal Q1 results beat estimates, which is a positive indicator for the company's financial health. This news is likely to have a positive impact on the stock price. Given that the Nasdaq Composite and S&P 500 are also up, it indicates a generally positive market sentiment, which could further support a potential increase in Apple's stock price. Therefore, the probability of the stock price rising is higher than the probability of it falling.
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.4, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3, Reasoning: The financial news discusses a potential threat to major tech companies like Nvidia, Amazon.com, and Alphabet posed by a cheaper AI model from DeepSeek. Despite concerns raised on Wall Street, the article suggests these concerns might be overblown. Since Apple Inc. is not directly mentioned as one of the 'vulnerable' companies, the impact on its stock price could be minimal. However, general market sentiment might still affect Apple's stock.


Now give your prediction about the probability of the stock price of the relevant company rising or falling. Format your response in JSON format and include the following information as follows: 
{ 
"reasoning": "[Summarize your analysis and reasoning process here]", 
"company_name": "[Company Name indicating the name of the company]", 
"company_symbol": "[Company Symbol indicating the stock symbol of the company]", 
"news_headline": "[News Headline indicating the provided financial news headline]", 
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will rise due to this news], 
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will fall due to this news], 
} 
Do not generate output that isn't in properly formatted JSON.

```json
{
  "reasoning": "The provided news headline and content discuss the impact of a Chinese AI startup, DeepSeek, on global tech stocks, including Apple's competitors like Nvidia and Microsoft. However, Apple's upcoming earnings report and its less vulnerable position in AI-related capital expenditure could provide a buffer. Given that the news does not directly mention Apple's AI capabilities or financial performance, but highlights potential positive earnings guidance, I estimate a slightly higher probability of the stock price rising. The mixed outlook and external factors like market sentiment and economic conditions contribute to the uncertainty.",
  "company_name": "Apple Inc.",
  "company_symbol": "AAPL",
  "news_headline": "DeepSeek sinks stocks, Big Tech earnings, and AI for cancer: AI news roundup",
  "probability_of_stock_price_rise": 0.6,
  "probability_of_stock_price_fall": 0.4,
}
```
